prompt: Chiikawastyle,Chiikawa,This is a digital drawing in a simple, cartoon style. The image features a white, round bear-like character named Chiikawa. Chiikawa has large, round black eyes with white highlights, and a small pink blush mark on its cheek. The bear is depicted with a cute, endearing expression. Chiikawa is holding a large, exaggeratedly large, pink tongue in its mouth, which is the main focus of the image. The tongue is drawn with detailed shading to give it a three-dimensional look. The background is plain white, making the character and the tongue stand out prominently. The overall mood of the drawing is playful and humorous.
